## Usage
Search your paired bluetooth devices via the `btd` keyword.
![Connect of disconnect devices](images/about/btd.png)
* <kbd>↩</kbd> Toggle connected state. * <kbd>⇧</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Ignore device. Restore it from the [Workflow’s Configuration](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/workflows/user-configuration/).
Toggle bluetooth as a whole via the `btt` keyword.
![Connect or disconnect bluetooth](images/about/btt.png)
* <kbd>↩</kbd> Toggle connected state.
Newline-separared list of devices to hide.
